comments: This contract includes one or more amendments.  This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract was sole-sourced. Microlight Computer Systems Ltd is the owner and developer of the Tech2 application which Real Property utilizes for building diagrams and CIOB supports in terms of releases and infrastructure.  The purpose of the contract are if modifications are required to the application by PWGSC ? Real Property Branch they must be done by Microlight as per a negotiated contract between Microlight and PWGSC.
